00038 #define THROW_TE(_code_, _str_) do { ThriftGen::ClientException te; \
00039   te.code = _code_; te.what = _str_; \
00040   te.__isset.code = te.__isset.what = true; \
00041   throw te; \
00042 } while (0)
00043 
00044 #define THROW_(_code_) do { \
00045   Hypertable::Exception e(_code_, __LINE__, HT_FUNC, __FILE__); \
00046   std::ostringstream oss; oss << e; \
00047   HT_ERROR_OUT << oss.str() << HT_END; \
00048   THROW_TE(_code_, oss.str()); \
00049 } while (0)
00050 
00051 #define RETHROW() catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) { \
00052   std::ostringstream oss;  oss << HT_FUNC <<": "<< e; \
00053   HT_ERROR_OUT << oss.str() << HT_END; \
00054   THROW_TE(e.code(), oss.str()); \
00055 }
00056 
00057 #define LOG_API(_expr_) do { \
00058   if (m_log_api) \
00059     std::cout << hires_ts <<" API "<< __func__ <<": "<< _expr_ << std::endl; \
00060 } while (0)

00081 struct HqlResultLog {
00082   HqlResultLog(const HqlResult &res) : result(res) { }
00083   const HqlResult &result;
00084 };
00085 
00086 ostream &operator<<(ostream &out, const HqlResultLog &l) {
00087   if (Logger::logger->isDebugEnabled())
00088     return out << l.result;
00089 
00090   if (l.result.__isset.results)
00091     out <<" results.size=" << l.result.results.size();
00092 
00093   if (l.result.__isset.cells)
00094     out <<" cells.size=" << l.result.cells.size();
00095 
00096   if (l.result.__isset.scanner)
00097     out <<" scanner="<< l.result.scanner;
00098 
00099   if (l.result.__isset.mutator)
00100     out <<" mutator="<< l.result.mutator;
00101 
00102   return out;
00103 }

00105 inline void
00106 convert_scan_spec(const ThriftGen::ScanSpec &tss, Hypertable::ScanSpec &hss) {
00107   if (tss.__isset.row_limit)
00108     hss.row_limit = tss.row_limit;
00109 
00110   if (tss.__isset.revs)
00111     hss.max_versions = tss.revs;
00112 
00113   if (tss.__isset.start_time)
00114     hss.time_interval.first = tss.start_time;
00115 
00116   if (tss.__isset.end_time)
00117     hss.time_interval.second = tss.end_time;
00118 
00119   if (tss.__isset.return_deletes)
00120     hss.return_deletes = tss.return_deletes;
00121 
00122   // shallow copy
00123   foreach(const ThriftGen::RowInterval &ri, tss.row_intervals)
00124     hss.row_intervals.push_back(Hypertable::RowInterval(ri.start_row.c_str(),
00125         ri.start_inclusive, ri.end_row.c_str(), ri.end_inclusive));
00126 
00127   foreach(const ThriftGen::CellInterval &ci, tss.cell_intervals)
00128     hss.cell_intervals.push_back(Hypertable::CellInterval(
00129         ci.start_row.c_str(), ci.start_column.c_str(), ci.start_inclusive,
00130         ci.end_row.c_str(), ci.end_column.c_str(), ci.end_inclusive));
00131 }
00132 
00133 inline void
00134 convert_cell(const ThriftGen::Cell &tcell, Hypertable::Cell &hcell) {
00135   // shallow copy
00136   if (tcell.__isset.row_key)
00137     hcell.row_key = tcell.row_key.c_str();
00138 
00139   if (tcell.__isset.column_family)
00140     hcell.column_family = tcell.column_family.c_str();
00141 
00142   if (tcell.__isset.column_qualifier)
00143     hcell.column_qualifier = tcell.column_qualifier.c_str();
00144 
00145   if (tcell.__isset.timestamp)
00146     hcell.timestamp = tcell.timestamp;
00147 
00148   if (tcell.__isset.revision)
00149     hcell.revision = tcell.revision;
00150 
00151   if (tcell.__isset.value) {
00152     hcell.value = (uint8_t *)tcell.value.c_str();
00153     hcell.value_len = tcell.value.length();
00154   }
00155   if (tcell.__isset.flag)
00156     hcell.flag = tcell.flag;
00157 }
00158 
00159 inline void
00160 convert_cell(const Hypertable::Cell &hcell, ThriftGen::Cell &tcell) {
00161   tcell.row_key = hcell.row_key;
00162   tcell.column_family = hcell.column_family;
00163 
00164   if (hcell.column_qualifier && *hcell.column_qualifier) {
00165     tcell.column_qualifier = hcell.column_qualifier;
00166     tcell.__isset.column_qualifier = true;
00167   }
00168   else
00169     tcell.__isset.column_qualifier = false;
00170 
00171   tcell.timestamp = hcell.timestamp;
00172   tcell.revision = hcell.revision;
00173 
00174   if (hcell.value && hcell.value_len) {
00175     tcell.value = std::string((char *)hcell.value, hcell.value_len);
00176     tcell.__isset.value = true;
00177   }
00178   else
00179     tcell.__isset.value = false;
00180 
00181   tcell.flag = hcell.flag;
00182   tcell.__isset.row_key = tcell.__isset.column_family = tcell.__isset.timestamp
00183       = tcell.__isset.revision = tcell.__isset.flag = true;
00184 }
00185 
00186 inline void
00187 convert_cells(const ThriftCells &tcells, Hypertable::Cells &hcells) {
00188   // shallow copy
00189   foreach(const ThriftGen::Cell &tcell, tcells) {
00190     Hypertable::Cell hcell;
00191     convert_cell(tcell, hcell);
00192     hcells.push_back(hcell);
00193   }
00194 }

00198 struct HqlCallback : HqlInterpreter::Callback {
00199   typedef HqlInterpreter::Callback Parent;
00200 
00201   HqlResult &result;
00202   ServerHandler *handler;
00203   bool flush, buffered;
00204 
00205   HqlCallback(HqlResult &res, ServerHandler *handler, bool flush, bool buffered)
00206     : result(res), handler(handler), flush(flush), buffered(buffered) { }
00207 
00208   virtual void on_return(const String &);
00209   virtual void on_scan(TableScanner &);
00210   virtual void on_finish(TableMutator *);
00211 };

00213 class ServerHandler : public HqlServiceIf {
00214 public:
00215   ServerHandler() {
00216     m_log_api = Config::get_bool("ThriftBroker.API.Logging");
00217     m_next_limit = Config::get_i32("ThriftBroker.NextLimit");
00218   }

00220   virtual void
00221   hql_exec(HqlResult& result, const String &hql, bool noflush,
00222            bool unbuffered) {
00223     LOG_API("hql="<< hql <<" noflush="<< noflush <<" unbuffered="<< unbuffered);
00224 
00225     try {
00226       HqlCallback cb(result, this, !noflush, !unbuffered);
00227       get_hql_interp().execute(hql, cb);
00228       LOG_API("result:"<< HqlResultLog(result));
00229     } RETHROW()
00230   }

00232   virtual void create_table(const String &table, const String &schema) {
00233     LOG_API("table="<< table <<" schema="<< schema);
00234 
00235     try {
00236       lazy_create_client();
00237       m_client->create_table(table, schema);
00238       LOG_API("table="<< table <<" done");
00239     } RETHROW()
00240   }

00242   virtual Scanner
00243   open_scanner(const String &table, const ThriftGen::ScanSpec &ss) {
00244     LOG_API("table="<< table <<" scan_spec="<< ss);
00245 
00246     try {
00247       Scanner id = get_scanner_id(_open_scanner(table, ss).get());
00248       LOG_API("scanner="<< id);
00249       return id;
00250     } RETHROW()
00251   }
00252 
00253   virtual void close_scanner(const Scanner scanner) {
00254     LOG_API("scanner="<< scanner);
00255 
00256     try {
00257       remove_scanner(scanner);
00258       LOG_API("scanner="<< scanner <<" done");
00259     } RETHROW()
00260   }

00262   virtual void next_cells(ThriftCells &result, const Scanner scanner_id) {
00263     LOG_API("scanner="<< scanner_id);
00264 
00265     try {
00266       TableScannerPtr scanner = get_scanner(scanner_id);
00267       _next(result, scanner, m_next_limit);
00268       LOG_API("scanner="<< scanner_id <<" result.size="<< result.size());
00269     } RETHROW()
00270   }

00272   virtual void
00273   get_row(ThriftCells &result, const String &table, const String &row) {
00274     LOG_API("table="<< table <<" row="<< row);
00275 
00276     try {
00277       lazy_create_client();
00278       TablePtr t = m_client->open_table(table);
00279       Hypertable::ScanSpec ss;
00280       ss.row_intervals.push_back(Hypertable::RowInterval(row.c_str(), true,
00281                                                          row.c_str(), true));
00282       ss.max_versions = 1;
00283       TableScannerPtr scanner = t->create_scanner(ss);
00284       _next(result, scanner, INT32_MAX);
00285       LOG_API("table="<< table <<" result.size="<< result.size());
00286     } RETHROW()
00287   }

00289   virtual void
00290   get_cell(Value &result, const String &table, const String &row,
00291            const String &column) {
00292     LOG_API("table="<< table <<" row="<< row <<" column="<< column);
00293 
00294     try {
00295       lazy_create_client();
00296       TablePtr t = m_client->open_table(table);
00297       Hypertable::ScanSpec ss;
00298 
00299       ss.cell_intervals.push_back(Hypertable::CellInterval(row.c_str(),
00300           column.c_str(), true, row.c_str(), column.c_str(), true));
00301       ss.max_versions = 1;
00302 
00303       Hypertable::Cell cell;
00304       TableScannerPtr scanner = t->create_scanner(ss);
00305 
00306       if (scanner->next(cell))
00307         result = String((char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00308 
00309       LOG_API("table="<< table <<" result="<< result);
00310     } RETHROW()
00311   }

00313   virtual void
00314   get_cells(ThriftCells &result, const String &table,

00317

00319       TableScannerPtr scanner = _open_scanner(table, ss);
00320       _next(result, scanner, INT32_MAX);
00321       LOG_API("table="<< table <<" result.size="<< result.size());

00325   virtual Mutator open_mutator(const String &table) {
00326     LOG_API("table="<< table);
00327 
00328     try {
00329       lazy_create_client();
00330       TablePtr t = m_client->open_table(table);
00331       Mutator id =  get_mutator_id(t->create_mutator());
00332       LOG_API("table="<< table <<" mutator="<< id);
00333       return id;
00334     } RETHROW()

00337   virtual void flush_mutator(const Mutator mutator) {
00338     LOG_API("mutator="<< mutator);
00339 
00340     try {
00341       get_mutator(mutator)->flush();
00342       LOG_API("mutator="<< mutator <<" done");
00343     } RETHROW()
00344   }
00345 
00346   virtual void close_mutator(const Mutator mutator, const bool flush) {
00347     LOG_API("mutator="<< mutator <<" flush="<< flush);
00348 
00349     try {
00350       if (flush)
00351         flush_mutator(mutator);
00352 
00353       remove_mutator(mutator);
00354       LOG_API("mutator="<< mutator <<" done");
00355     } RETHROW()
00356   }

00358   virtual void set_cells(const Mutator mutator, const ThriftCells &cells) {
00359     LOG_API("mutator="<< mutator <<" cell.size="<< cells.size());
00360 
00361     try {
00362       Hypertable::Cells hcells;
00363       convert_cells(cells, hcells);
00364       get_mutator(mutator)->set_cells(hcells);
00365       LOG_API("mutator="<< mutator <<" done");
00366     } RETHROW()
00367   }
00368 
00369   virtual void set_cell(const Mutator mutator, const ThriftGen::Cell &cell) {
00370     LOG_API("mutator="<< mutator <<" cell="<< cell);
00371 
00372     try {
00373       CellsBuilder cb;
00374       Hypertable::Cell hcell;
00375       convert_cell(cell, hcell);
00376       cb.add(hcell, false);
00377       get_mutator(mutator)->set_cells(cb.get());
00378       LOG_API("mutator="<< mutator <<" done");
00379     } RETHROW()
00380   }

00382   virtual int32_t get_table_id(const String &name) {
00383     LOG_API("table="<< name);
00384 
00385     try {
00386       int32_t id = -1;
00387       if (name != "!magic-query-table") {
00388         lazy_create_client();
00389         id = m_client->get_table_id(name);
00390       }
00391       LOG_API("table="<< name <<" id="<< id);
00392       return id;
00393     } RETHROW()
00394   }

00408     try {

00418     try {

00420       m_client->drop_table(table, if_exists);
00421       LOG_API("table="<< table <<" done");

00429   TableScannerPtr
00430   _open_scanner(const String &name, const ThriftGen::ScanSpec &ss) {
00431     lazy_create_client();
00432     TablePtr t = m_client->open_table(name);
00433     Hypertable::ScanSpec hss;
00434     convert_scan_spec(ss, hss);
00435     return t->create_scanner(hss);
00436   }
00437 
00438   void _next(ThriftCells &result, TableScannerPtr &scanner, int limit) {
00439     Hypertable::Cell cell;
00440 
00441     for (int i = 0; i < limit; ++i) {
00442       if (scanner->next(cell)) {
00443         ThriftGen::Cell tcell;
00444         convert_cell(cell, tcell);
00445         result.push_back(tcell);
00446       }
00447       else
00448         break;
00449     }
00450   }

00452   HqlInterpreter &get_hql_interp() {
00453     ScopedLock lock(m_interp_mutex);
00454 
00455     lazy_create_client();
00456 
00457     if (!m_hql_interp)
00458       m_hql_interp = m_client->create_hql_interpreter();
00459 
00460     return *m_hql_interp;
00461   }

00463   int64_t get_scanner_id(TableScanner *scanner) {
00464     ScopedLock lock(m_scanner_mutex);
00465     int64_t id = (int64_t)scanner;
00466     m_scanner_map.insert(make_pair(id, scanner)); // no overwrite
00467     return id;
00468   }
00469 
00470   TableScannerPtr get_scanner(int64_t id) {
00471     ScopedLock lock(m_scanner_mutex);
00472     ScannerMap::iterator it = m_scanner_map.find(id);
00473 
00474     if (it != m_scanner_map.end())
00475       return it->second;
00476 
00477     THROW_(Error::THRIFTBROKER_BAD_SCANNER_ID);
00478   }
00479 
00480   void remove_scanner(int64_t id) {
00481     ScopedLock lock(m_scanner_mutex);
00482     ScannerMap::iterator it = m_scanner_map.find(id);
00483 
00484     if (it != m_scanner_map.end()) {
00485       m_scanner_map.erase(it);
00486       return;
00487     }
00488 
00489     THROW_(Error::THRIFTBROKER_BAD_SCANNER_ID);
00490   }
00491 
00492   int64_t get_mutator_id(TableMutator *mutator) {
00493     ScopedLock lock(m_mutator_mutex);
00494     int64_t id = (int64_t)mutator;
00495     m_mutator_map.insert(make_pair(id, mutator)); // no overwrite
00496     return id;
00497   }
00498 
00499   TableMutatorPtr get_mutator(int64_t id) {
00500     ScopedLock lock(m_mutator_mutex);
00501     MutatorMap::iterator it = m_mutator_map.find(id);
00502 
00503     if (it != m_mutator_map.end())
00504       return it->second;
00505 
00506     THROW_(Error::THRIFTBROKER_BAD_MUTATOR_ID);
00507   }
00508 
00509   void remove_mutator(int64_t id) {
00510     ScopedLock lock(m_mutator_mutex);
00511     MutatorMap::iterator it = m_mutator_map.find(id);
00512 
00513     if (it != m_mutator_map.end()) {
00514       m_mutator_map.erase(it);
00515       return;
00516     }
00517 
00518     THROW_(Error::THRIFTBROKER_BAD_MUTATOR_ID);
00519   }

00521 private:
00522   void lazy_create_client() {
00523     if (!m_client)
00524       m_client = new Hypertable::Client();
00525   }
00526 
00527   bool       m_log_api;
00528   Mutex      m_scanner_mutex;
00529   ScannerMap m_scanner_map;
00530   Mutex      m_mutator_mutex;
00531   MutatorMap m_mutator_map;
00532   int32_t    m_next_limit;
00533   ClientPtr  m_client;
00534   Mutex      m_interp_mutex;
00535   HqlInterpreterPtr m_hql_interp;

00537 
00538 void HqlCallback::on_return(const String &ret) {
00539   result.results.push_back(ret);
00540   result.__isset.results = true;
00541 }
00542 
00543 void HqlCallback::on_scan(TableScanner &s) {
00544   if (buffered) {
00545     Hypertable::Cell hcell;
00546     ThriftGen::Cell tcell;
00547 
00548     while (s.next(hcell)) {
00549       convert_cell(hcell, tcell);
00550       result.cells.push_back(tcell);
00551     }
00552     result.__isset.cells = true;
00553   }
00554   else {
00555     result.scanner = handler->get_scanner_id(&s);
00556     result.__isset.scanner = true;
00557   }
00558 }
00559 
00560 void HqlCallback::on_finish(TableMutator *m) {
00561   if (flush) {
00562     Parent::on_finish(m);
00563   }
00564   else if (m) {
00565     result.mutator = handler->get_mutator_id(m);
00566     result.__isset.mutator = true;
00567   }
00568 }

00572 
00573 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00574   using namespace Hypertable;
00575   using namespace ThriftBroker;
00576 
00577   try {
00578     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00579 
00580     uint16_t port = get_i16("port");
00581     shared_ptr<TProtocolFactory> protocolFactory(new TBinaryProtocolFactory());
00582     shared_ptr<ServerHandler> handler(new ServerHandler());
00583     shared_ptr<TProcessor> processor(new HqlServiceProcessor(handler));
00584     TNonblockingServer server(processor, protocolFactory, port);
00585 
00586     HT_INFO("Starting the server...");
00587     server.serve();
00588     HT_INFO("Exiting.\n");
00589   }
00590   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00591     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00592   }
00593   return 0;
00594 }
